DOC.detailed_description: This study enroll 10 adult complete four experimental condition random order . Each four experimental condition follow : 1 ) sit continuously 8 hour simulated office environment , 2 ) break-up sit time stand base set hourly interval , 3 ) break-up sit time slow-walking treadmill desk base set hourly interval , 4 ) increase energy expenditure slow cycling base set hourly interval . Participants complete condition one week apart dietary intake standardize give participant meal intervention condition . Study measure include : anthropometrics ( height weight ) , blood pressure , fast glucose , 24-continuous glucose monitoring , full-day ambulatory blood pressure monitoring , cognitive testing ( cognitive performance ) , energy expenditure , physical activity via accelerometer , sleep via accelerometer , heart rate .
